attributes.review: I downloaded this and the my phone started glitching a lot. Freezing and crashing, it was bad. Tried re-starting, that didn’t work. Tried a bunch of other troubleshooting and nothing worked. Deleted the app, and everything worked fine again. Don’t download this app! Needs more work so it doesn’t damage more phones! Would rate 0 stars if I could!
attributes.title: Glitchy

attributes.review: i would take the time to write a long, dedicated review about this app but it really doesn’t deserve it. Everything g about it is completely below standards and not even on the chart. In fact- it’s about 1,349 miles behind it. I am disappointed to say i even downloaded it, if i could i would delete all memory of this app from my brain. Terrible.
attributes.title: i cant even put into words-

attributes.review: Was informed that this is not the Wendy’s drive thru so let’s start there with my disappointment. This app is terrible. The interface is terrible. It glitches frequently. It freezes my entire phone to the point where I have to do a manual shut down of my phone every five minutes. Also imagine supporting a white supremacist. Y’all are 🤡.
attributes.title: Black Lives Matter, Donald Trump is a white Supremacist, Full stop.

attributes.review: 😪😪😪 I do not even know where to start with the horrors within this app I downloaded this with high hopes 🧚🏾🦋only to be let down in the most terrible of ways 😡🤬 I opened it to see the president of our great United States and saw a horrific orange thing instead 🍊🍊 My family and i are still haunted to this day, don’t download this app if you aren’t ready to face the terrible consequences 😤
attributes.title: Just awful

attributes.review: First of all why is the person so orange.. I just find it terribly disturbing and my loving family shouldn’t be seeing that to traumatize them. Second I hate the colors 🙈✨ it doesn’t seem right . The whole app in general is just a mess 😒 for some reason it’s made to support the wrong person like I think that’s a big glitch and it should be fixed like right now. Anyway manny 2020 🙈✨✨❤️❤️🥰❤️🧚🏽🧚🏽🧚🏽
attributes.title: Worst app 2020

attributes.review: my phone was so overwhelmed by orange when I opened this app that it completely died and now I have to write this review on my samsung smart fridge. the whole house now reeks of cheeto and we have to get fumigated because the ants came to invade. the effect spreads through the neighborhood    and now we can only see the color orange. everyone in the neighborhood will have to get their eyes replaced to make it stop.
attributes.title: bad stuff happens

attributes.review: This is by far the worst app ive ever downloaded. 0/10 do NOT recommended. It started when i opened the app, and it glitched out a small man jumped through my phone and stabbed my dog with his own broken femur bone, all while a high pitched screaming was radiating from the speakers. Both of my kneecaps combusted from how startled i was, and i most definitely have ptsd and will be seeing a therapist because of this mortifying experience.
attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️✨no✨🧚‍♀️🌼

attributes.review: . I wanted to support him but this app made me somehow throw up and my skin began to turn orange! Then suddenly I started to go bald and I kept gaining weight. Not only that but the app managed to blow up my refrigerator and when I tried to delete the app it sent me a threat saying that it would kill me😔. It also said a bunch of racist slurs to me as I continued to try and delete the app. I do not reccomend. It’s absolutely horrible. TRUMP 2020🥰🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼 but on a gravestone .

Omg when I open the app I was shocked no I was Disgusting I cannot believe what I saw with my two own eyes. At first the screen was black then it turned white and then it started flashing lights colorful lights to be exact but not only did this hurt my eyes  I witness my cousin get a seizure this app needs to put a warning so the people who have Epilepsy can enjoy one out of five stars 1/5 😡 not happy 
🖕Wow what a president we have 🙄🖕
attributes.title: Not happy 🤮😱

attributes.review: I mean, when i downloaded this app i was like, eh hes still a person. but i am traumatized. I thought id see politics but instead i saw some cheeto babies attempting to rule a fantasy world, which did not work out, and they sucked at it too. the world is collapsing. and every other country in the world makes fun of is for our president. oh wait, the only people with brains in this country do that too.
attributes.title: just no
